CBD Liposomals

Natural Native has taken the natural benefits of hemp extracts and given them a scientific boost. By embedding the phytocannabinoids within naturally occurring liposomal phospholipids Natural Native’s Hemp Extract Sprays are up to five times (5X) more bioavailable than hemp extracts taken alone. This means that you can get the same effect from a much lower dose!

Why do Liposomes help absorption?

Every cell in your body has what is known as a cell membrane. It is the wall that surrounds the cell and keeps bad things out and good things in. This membrane is made up of two layers of phospholipids, a phospholipid bi-layer. Phospholipids are basically just phosphorus molecules connected to the end of fat molecules. Liposomes are tiny spheres made from cholesterol and naturally-occurring phospholipids. These spheres can surround certain types of compounds and nutrients like Vitamin C, Vitamin E, CoQ10 and CBD and when they enter or come in contact with the cells of the body they are able to feed the cell membranes with the phospholipids and deliver the nutrients contained within them directly to the cells.

Why Choose Us?

A SUPERIOR HEMP EXTRACT DELIVERY SYSTEM

The delivery method represents a breakthrough in hemp extract consumption. Engineered for purity, bioavailability and convenience, a superior hemp extract delivery system in an easy-to-use spray. The formula is atomized and broken down into tiny hemp extract particles for sublingual absorption, by-passing the digestive process that traditional hemp extract tinctures must undergo.

QUALITY FROM THE SOURCE:

Our hemp extract is derived from hemp grown in US using organic standards. This ensures there are no harmful herbicides, pesticides or other dangerous chemicals used during cultivation.

YOU DESERVE THE BEST!

The final result is a, high-potency hemp extract that’s easy to use on the go. Because of the advanced delivery system, you’re getting the beneficial effects of hemp extract within 2-3 minutes of use.

Frequently Asked Questions

CBD oil is made by extracting CBD isolates from industrial hemp and then infused into a carrier oil. There are many ways to extract CBD isolates from raw hemp material – some methods allow the retention of other beneficial cannabinoids and terpenes. The carrier oil is usually a type of coconut-based oil or palm kernel oil.

There are several different ways you can use CBD oil, depending on your purpose for using it. You can use CBD for temporary relief from pain and soreness by applying a generous amount of topical cream into the skin or soaking in water with a bath bomb. Or CBD could be helpful for general wellness with a few tincture drops or a couple of capsules in the morning or evening. And for sleep, a dropper full from a CBD sleep aid or a softgel before bed may help.

However, consistency is essential for achieving the best results; you should take CBD daily for at least 30 days to know how well it works for you

CBD oil works by interacting with a bodily system known as the endocannabinoid system (or ECS). The primary function of our ECS is to maintain homeostasis, which is our bodies' natural balance to perform and operate efficiently against external and internal stressors.
